name: Performance Food Group Company
description: Performance Food Group Company (PFG) is a leading foodservice distributor in the United States, specializing in providing food and related products to a diverse range of customers including restaurants, schools, and healthcare facilities. Founded in 1885, PFG has grown through a series of strategic acquisitions and organic growth initiatives, becoming a trusted partner in the food supply chain. The company operates through a network of distribution centers and offers an extensive portfolio of products, including fresh and frozen foods, dry goods, and non-food items. PFG prides itself on its commitment to quality and customer service, leveraging advanced technology and logistics to ensure efficient delivery and supply chain management. With a focus on innovation, PFG continuously seeks to improve its offerings and streamline operations to meet the evolving needs of its customers. The company also emphasizes sustainability in its operations, striving to reduce environmental impact through responsible sourcing and waste reduction initiatives. PFG's mission is to be the most trusted and dependable partner to its customers, providing them with the resources they need to succeed in a competitive marketplace.
